title: why is draft not 24/7?
body:
in draft you have a 75/25 chance to get non-raging non-afking players who actually play their assigned roles (that they chose) and you can have a good game. 

blind pick you have a 10% chance of getting your assigned role and that 10% is also the chance that you will get non-raging non-afking players...


is it a server maintainence or money issue?
